room_title: Escape room "Murder Express" by Project: Escape in Atlanta
room_address: 1395 South Marietta Pkwy SE #230, Marietta, GA 30067
room_description: William Waterfeller, a highly successful and shady businessman with a fortune estimated in the billions, was just found dead on the Orient Express. You and your fellow passengers have been quarantined to the private car of Mr. Waterfeller under suspicion of homicide. You must solve the case in order to prove your innocence, however, you must do so within one hour before the train crosses international borders and the killer goes free.
